titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the Cathedral Church at Winchester the xxix of May MDCLXXXI, being Trinity Sunday, and the day of His Majesties happy birth and restauration by Henry Anderson ...
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Henry, b. 1651 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Joanna Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: "Printed at the request of many who heard it."
